web_snippets: Philippa Perry ... Philippa, Lady Perry (née Fairclough; born 1 November 1957), is a British integrative psychotherapist and author. Philippa, Lady Perry. Born.

Philippa Perry is a psychotherapist and a writer. She has written for the Guardian, The Observer, Time Out and The Times and Psychologies Magazine.
